name: Merrell Thermo Overlook 2 Tall Arctic Grip Waterproof - Men's
categories: Thermo Overlook 2 Tall Arctic Grip Waterproof
description: Head into the wintery backcountry with warmth and traction. Plenty of insulation stands up to the teeth-chattering chills of winter, and the Arctic Grip sole sticks to snow and ice, making slips and slides part of your distant past. A snowshoe strap ridge keeps your foot secure in snowshoe bindings.Full-grain leather upper with a TPU shell for weather and abrasion protection.M Select™ Dry Barrier waterproof-breathable membrane keeps water out while letting your feet breathe.400g M Select™ Warm insulation keeps feet warm.Bellows tongue keeps trail debris and snow out.Fleece lining is soft next to the skin.Kinetic Fit™ Advanced fleece lined insole is warm and supportive.EVA midsole with a molded nylon shank provide cushion and stability.Air cushion in the heel absorbs shock.Vibram® Arctic Grip® All Terrain outsole has 5mm lugs for superior traction on slippery winter surfaces.
